response.overview: A film that tries to reflect the contemporary moment and the way it feels to exist in the 2020s as honestly and accurately as possible. Filmed in 2022, a group of people in NYC mostly just try to stay alive and feel okay in a society that seems to be degenerating in every direction. Now time and entropy has scattered us like garbage in the waves.. but for one moment we were all together and we were beautiful.
response.title: faster! faster! faster!
